webforest 0.2.1

Resolve all row-level style expressions

Source: R/utils-nse.R
resolve_row_style_exprs.Rd

Convenience function used by web_spec() to resolve all row styling parameters at once. Supports both column names and formulas.

resolve_row_style_exprs(
  data,
  row_bold = NULL,
  row_italic = NULL,
  row_color = NULL,
  row_bg = NULL,
  row_badge = NULL,
  row_icon = NULL,
  row_indent = NULL,
  row_type = NULL,
  row_emphasis = NULL,
  row_muted = NULL,
  row_accent = NULL,
  marker_color = NULL,
  marker_shape = NULL,
  marker_opacity = NULL,
  marker_size = NULL,
  weight = NULL
)

Arguments

data

Data frame

row_bold

Bold styling expression

row_italic

Italic styling expression

row_color

Text color expression

row_bg

Background color expression

row_badge

Badge expression

row_icon

Icon expression

row_indent

Indent expression

row_type

Row type expression

row_emphasis

Emphasis styling expression

row_muted

Muted styling expression

row_accent

Accent styling expression

marker_color

Marker color expression

marker_shape

Marker shape expression

marker_opacity

Marker opacity expression

marker_size

Marker size expression

weight

Deprecated weight expression

Value

List with:

  • data: Modified data frame (with computed columns if formulas used)

  • Named elements for each resolved column name (NA_character_ if NULL)
